name: Sniper Club Multiplayer
description:
This is a game I made for Ludum Dare #49 in 48 hours.

It is a multiplayer 1st person shooter with sniper rifles only.

To play, download the windows client and use this IP address as the game server: 54.174.87.64 

I am distributing the linux dedicated server exe so you can host your own games.

The source code is also available and may start as a good starting point for making UE4 multiplayer shooter games.
